question: How does the variant FLT3 F691L affect response to Lestaurtinib in Acute Myeloid Leukemia?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FLT3 F691L'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lestaurtinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lestaurtinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lestaurtinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Acute Myeloid Leukemia')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pembrolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pembrolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pembrolizumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Gastroesophageal Junction Adenocarcinoma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR VIII'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('High Grade Glioma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Temozolomide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Temozolomide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Temozolomide')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Glioblastoma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FCGR3A F212V'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Her2-receptor Positive Breast')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
